name: FCS
description: Import a Flow Cytometry Standard file (.fcs).

properties.name: use.builtin.compensation
properties.description: A logical value indicating whether the built-in compensation matrix should be use (Set to false if you do not want the application of the built-in compensation or if you want to use an external matrix).

properties.name: use.custom.compensation
properties.description: A logical value indicating whether the custom compensation matrix should be use (Set to false if you do not want the application of the compensation or if you want to use an internal matrix).

properties.name: which.lines
properties.description: Indicate the number of lines to be read. If -1, all rows are read, otherwise, a random sample of the size indicated by which.lines is read in

properties.name: alter.names
properties.description: boolean indicating whether or not we should rename the columns to valid names
